title: Essential VS2010 Javascript Extension
content:
I just saw this on a [MIX session recording,](https://channel9.msdn.com/Events/MIX/MIX11/FRM12) and I LOVE it

This adds in C# designtime behaviors into Javascript.  What I mean by that is (from the [JScript Editor Extensions page](https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/872d27ee-38c7-4a97-98dc-0d8a431cc2ed))

#### Brace Matching

Adds support for automatically highlighting the matching opening or closing brace to the one currently at the cursor. Supports matching parenthesis: (), square brackets: \[\], and curly braces: {}. Braces in strings, comments and regular expression literals are ignored.

#### Outlining / Cold-folding

Adds support for automatically creating outlining regions for JScript blocks. Blocks are detected via opening and closing curly braces. Braces in strings, comments and regular expression literals are ignored.

#### Current Word Highlighting

Adds support for highlighting all instances of the word currently at the cursor.

[GET IT NOW](https://visualstudiogallery.msdn.microsoft.com/872d27ee-38c7-4a97-98dc-0d8a431cc2ed)
seoDescription: Great Visual Studio 2010 Extension to add C# designtime behaviors into the Javascript editor.
